name: NADIA AND THE TEMPLES OF CLOUDS
name_original: NADIA AND THE TEMPLES OF CLOUDS
description:
Princess Nadia must be quick, her father the king of the kingdom cloud
decide to declare war on the kingdom low land if it does not bring
back the proof of their good faith!

The only way to arrive in time is to take the forbidden path on which
are the 11 ancient sacred temples!

Fortunately a nice genius will help her to overcome these obstacles!

Cross the 11 temples, and be a guarantor of peace between the kingdoms.

This prototype is my submission to GAMES FACTORY JAM 6.

Graphics, coding, sound by ROBOWARRIOR1982.

SOFTWARE USED:

GAME MAKER STUDIO 1.4, FIRE ALPACA, MUSIC MATCH, AUDIOCATALYST.

CONTROL:

Use the mouse to move the hand of genius, click left to create a jumping bonus, and click right to create a slide bonus (and escape to leave).

Tips : click on the statues in the temples to stop them from shooting (see screenshoot).

HTML5 version on NEWGROUNDS here :

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/714810?updated=1533064048

Thanks for playing !
